# Adapters API

This page documents the built-in adapters provided by pydapter.

## CSV Adapter

::: pydapter.adapters.csv_
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_source: true

## JSON Adapter

::: pydapter.adapters.json_
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_source: true

## TOML Adapter

::: pydapter.adapters.toml_
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_source: true
